item.title: UBS raises price target on Nvidia ahead of earnings, says tailwinds ‘remain strong’
item.description: UBS is growing more bullish on Nvidia ahead of its second-quarter earnings results after the bell next Wednesday.

item.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Tech shares slumped on Wednesday, dragging the S&P 500 to its fourth straight losing session. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Thursday.

item.title: Crypto treasury firms whose shares once soared have tumbled in August. Here are the big winners and losers
item.description: Crypto accumulators became central players this summer as investors sought bigger returns during a bitcoin price slump.

item.title: Buy these stocks that consistently beat earnings estimates and are liked by analysts, Jefferies says
item.description: The firm used artificial intelligence to screen for positive analyst sentiment on earnings calls.

item.title: This biotech stock could see a sharp swing higher after years of struggling, charts suggest
item.description: Chart analyst Frank Cappelleri breaks down the technical outlook on the biotech stock.
